column2: I apologize for our servers' asking you for your drink order several times. I spoke to my staff and they said there was confusion regarding the assignment of sections
column3: which was coupled with poor organizational skills. Furthermore
column4: did you order any tapas dishes? If so
column5: that might have been the reason your ramen dishes came out after other customers' dishes. We have separate chefs preparing these items
column6: and we try our best to time them accordingly.
